sub_title: Founding Partner at HUMИN Design & Transformation
summary:
Hi, I am Gijs! Entrepreneur and leader in Design & Innovation. 

Currently, I am co-founder of HUMИN a design & transformation consultancy. I have served countless blue chip clients at C-level of multi-nationals in their digital business transformations.

As a leader in design I have worked for leading agencies such as Lost Boys, MakerStreet and Fjord of Accenture Interactive. I've represented Fjord in The Netherlands, as the lead the Amsterdam satellite-studio of Fjord Paris. 

I have 12y of experiences as a professional in areas such as creative strategy, digital and brand strategy, always with service design at the core. I have worked with leading design, advertising and consultancy agencies.

Skill area's:
Strategy, Design-Led-Strategy, Business Transformations, Business Design, Digital Strategy, Advertising, Marketing, Branding, Customer Experience, Experience-Led-Transformations.  

Design methods: Business Design, Service Design, Experience Design, Data Design.

Delivery of digital transformations: Design Thinking, Lean, Agile, Scrum

Thought Leadership: Transformaking, Augmented Organizations

Leadershipstyle: Inspiring motivator. 

I helps brands and businesses with putting their customers front and center, by designing their business transformation around people and culture. 

In my spare time I like to cruise my boat in Amsterdam or Loenen aan de Vecht with my family.

I interviewed him as a part of three interviews on digital innovation at Philips. Meer weten?

projects.title: Door van Vereniging Eigen Huis
projects.description:
Scrum Master and creative strategist for the service innovation Door by Vereniging Eigen Huis. It was the honest and nobel ambition of Door to ramp-up the Dutch housing market. Door was a new house sale service in which house owner try to collectively sell their houses in so called 'trains' of houses.

Gijs played an active and key role in advising the client on the creative development and the positioning of the new service. Gijs coöperated with a variety of other disciplines and organizations out-side of the core-project team including: Real estate brokers, Funda, PWC and Kennedy vd Laan (tax and legal advise) and The Dutch Tax administration.

Door sold several houses in a train. After an initial spark, the housing market showed its first sings of recovery and therefore Door was to be terminated.

Founding Partner at HUMИN Design & Transformation

profile_positions.description:
HUMИN Design & Transformation Consultancy

HUMИN designs business transformations around people and culture. We help businesses to lead this 2020 Transition-Decade. 

Transformaking is our Experience-Led-Transformation method.
Our Vision is that Augmented Organizations will lead the Era of Transition. 

Our Mission is to help businesses to lead this 2020 Transition-Decade.
Our Ambition is to transform them into Augmented Organizations. 

Augmented Organizations are purpose led brands that improve the lives of people and prosper society and the planet. Their ability to cope with change is a key competitive advantage. Augmented Organizations add value by creating new experience layers for customers, employees and stakeholders. At the same time they reduce their ecological footprint. 

Please reach-out in a DM for business inquiries, or if you want to learn more. 
www.humnn.design
profile_positions.title: Founding Partner

profile_positions.description:
Owner of The Creative Strategist. 

As an entrepreneur, I am actively bringing Creative Strategy and Business Design to the market to re-invent my client's business and customer relationships. 

Active in fields of Design, Advertising, Marketing, Customer Experience Design, Business Transformation, Digital Transformation and Experience-Led-Transformation.
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
Head of Business Design at Rain, part of MakerStreet. Responsible for developing the business and directing teams in projects for clients in FS and Smart Industries.

Impact
Design-Led-Transformation of large chemical client's business: Industry 4.0, Additive Manufacturing, 3D-Printing, data, Machine Learning, AI. 
Pivotal role in business development. Sold several key projects successfully. 
Development of Rain's Business Design proposition.
profile_positions.title: Head of Business Design at Rain, part of MakerStreet

profile_positions.description:
Senior Manager at Accenture Interactive and Lead of Fjord in Amsterdam.

Leadership roles 	
Lead of FJORD in Amsterdam, a satellite studio of Fjord Paris 
Service Design Director at FJORD Design & Innovation from Accenture Interactive
Design Strategy Director of Design Chapter, Accenture-Interactive

Member of Management Teams 	
MT Accenture-Interactive NL, as Sr. Manager and Fjord Lead
MT Fjord Gallia (FR, NL, BE) as Lead of Fjord NL a satellite of Paris
LT Experience Design Chapter ±50fte Accenture Interactive, as Design Strategy Director

Responsibilities 	
Leading and representing Fjord in Amsterdam The Netherlands 
•	Business Development and primary contact for clients in The Netherlands regarding Fjord
•	Management of international design teams and client-relationships at C-level of blue-chip accounts in Global projects across region; active on all of Accenture’s Operating-Groups: Resources, Products, Financial Service, Communication Media & Tech, Health & Public Services

Result 
Contributed to growth of turnover and positive net revenue 
•	Up-lift of chargeability up-to-target across studios in the region
•	Reinvention of client-relationships on strategic accounts 
•	Contributed to cultures of Design & Innovation and Inclusion & Diversity across region
•	Significant contribution to studio revenues across region

Impact 	
Service Design Director of design teams Pan EU - across studios i.e. Paris, London, Milan, Brussels - on the Global transformation of a large energy client. 
Lead of pitch teams and "cloud" design-team with C-suite engagement. 

Wins
Strategic wins and pivotal role on growth of blue-chip accounts in The Netherlands and across the region. 

Digital Transformation
Mostly, to re-orient the client's business, by redefining their customer relationships as part of large digital transformations, with a design-led-transformation approach.
profile_positions.title: Lead of Fjord in Amsterdam, part of Accenture-Interactive

profile_positions.description:
The Creative Strategist is Gijs' Freelance company from which he works for a variety of creative agencies, companies and start-ups. Gijs is active in the fields of: Service Design, Digital Innovation, Branding, Brand Activation, Advertising and Marketing. 

Some of the companies Gijs has worked for in the past include: 
The USP Company, serving SNS with an insights based mortgage proposition and vision.
KINboat, Interim Marketing Manager at a green start-up boat company in Amsterdam.
profile_positions.title: Owner and Founder

profile_positions.description:
Gijs Oostendorp is a creative strategist and founder of GO Bang Concepts & Strategy and active in the fields of digital innovation, brand activation and advertising campaigns. 

Gijs has cooperated with agencies such as: 
Wecanbeheroes, serving CHUNK and Xceed.
JWT Hamburg, serving the Wilkinson Sword HYDRO 5 Facebook campaign. 
Khanna\Reidinga, serving GGD Amsterdam and the Sonos and Sony pitch. 
Fitzroy, serving the NL Ziet pitch. 

Gijs was awarded the first award as Future Digital Data Talent by Hyper Island and adidas in 2013. Gijs is experienced in branding, integrated advertising campaigns, brand activation, digital innovation and omni-channel e-commerce concepts and strategy. Gijs blends in digital trends such as data, mobile, the Internet of things and 3D printing, always with a keen eye for KPI's, user centered design and consumer insights.
profile_positions.title: Creative Strategist

profile_positions.description:
As a creative planner Gijs was responsible for planning advertising strategies, developing insights and leveraging creative output of creative teams, focussing on ground breaking creative concepts that challenge conventions.

At XXS Amsterdam Gijs served several projects for several brands:
Sprout magazine rebranding: 'The new boys network' 
Dirk van den Broek activation campaign: Dirk Stikeez
Florius brand strategy
profile_positions.title: Creative Planner

profile_positions.description:
Gijs created cutting-edge strategies for digital concepts, focussing on service innovations with a disruptive impact in the marketplace.

Brands

KRO: A workshop on digital disruption led to the development of a disruptive digital innovation. 
Ecover: An omni-channel e-commerce vision.

At DigitasLbi Gijs was active in the field of online strategy, brand strategy, service innovation, social media monitoring and business model generation. 

At DigitasLBi Gijs was an active member of the task force Creative Industries, part of The Innovation Platform, an initiative by former Prime Minister of The Netherlands Jan Peter Balkenende.
